title: キラめく、輝く、あの子の背

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Starting next year, the senior class...
There are so many big races.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
To become someone that can make everyone happy,
there are so many races I can't miss...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But I've lost sight of what to aim for when I run.
Even when I go to the grounds, my legs won't move...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
——That's when, at the grounds I forced myself to go to,
I happened to see it.

text_block_list.name: Two People
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaaaah——!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...They look like they're having fun...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I want to run too...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm! I'm getting warmed up!
Mornings really feel great!

Days continued as preparations for the 'Diamond S'
progressed steadily.
One such early morning.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Is that Rice-san over there in the distance?
Is she doing morning practice?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
——Huff!
Okay, one more!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I have to get stronger before Bourbon-san returns...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ——Taaaaaaah——!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, amazing sharpness!
She seems to have gotten her energy back!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I was worried when she was feeling down,
but I'm glad, I'm glad~.

From that day on, Rice Shower could be seen
running diligently every day at the grounds.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah, huff, hah...
It's hard to breathe...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But I can still keep going... right!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haaah――!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san...
One such day.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, hoo~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright, quota achieved!
Yeah, the time feels good too~.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Good work, Tannhauser-san.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Bourbon-saan!
Is it okay for you to run?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, 'full-speed running' is still not possible.
Instead, I'm doing walking.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Actually, I'd like to do training like before,
but my doctor has emphasized that 'overexertion is forbidden.'

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: However, recovery is expected to be faster than anticipated.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Really?! That's great~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Your complexion looks good, so I'm relieved! When I visited you,
you seemed a bit low on energy~.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
That... yes, that's right.
At that time, I was in a state of 'low energy.'

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
It was right after finishing the 'Kikuka-sho' and
'gearing up' for the senior class.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see, that's right...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But as expected of Bourbon-san!
You have the power to get back up without giving in!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, I recognize it as somewhat different
from a self-driven comeback.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...The other day, I saw Rice-san running.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Compared to the old Rice-san,
her form, speed, and time had all
grown by a notch.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
For some reason, the reason is unclear,
but I couldn't take my eyes off her as she ran hard――

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: During my challenge for the Triple Crown, I remembered the words of encouragement we exchanged and the promise we made after moving up to the senior class.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Seeing that small back racing up the hill path—

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: It felt like I was being told, 'You must not give up here.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Rice-san...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Yes.
...Rice-san is a wonderful Umamusume.
On the way home that day, Matikanetannhauser was unusually quiet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It was Rice-san who pushed Bourbon-san's back, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Compared to my spur-of-the-moment 'It'll be okay!' in the hospital room, many, many times more—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Rice-san's running figure had power in it, didn't it?
As she spoke, Matikanetannhauser's cheeks seemed somewhat flushed.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's amazing, isn't it! I can't find the right words, though.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because it was Rice-san, she could encourage Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That means Rice-san is like a hero to Bourbon-san... or rather, that.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: A presence that sparkles in the center of your heart and gives you courage and the strength to move forward—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: 'Protagonist.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah... 'Protagonist.' I feel like that fits best.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...'Protagonist,' protagonist. Rice-san is amazing.
After that, she kept muttering the word 'protagonist' over and over, as if savoring it.
